greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of coefficients of monomial symmetric functions in the power sum symmetric function of the integer partition with Heinz number n.
comment: The Heinz number of an integer partition (y_1, ..., y_k) is prime(y_1) * ... * prime(y_k).
Also the number of ordered set partitions of {1, 2, ..., A001222(n)} whose blocks, when i is replaced by the i-th prime index of n, have weakly decreasing sums.
example: The sum of coefficients of p(211) = m(4) + 2m(22) + 2m(31) + 2m(211) is a(12) = 7.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Nov 20 2018
